description: net: fix unintentional error variable shadowing

messages.text:
LGTM

I am not sure how feasible it is to review old CLs for
shadowing, but if you have time and are so inclined,
that would be great.  But if not, I'm not too worried.
Thanks.

On Tue, Jan 17, 2012 at 10:55 AM,  <rsc@golang.org> wrote:

> I am not sure how feasible it is to review old CLs for
> shadowing,

A human‐wave tactics. :-)

> but if you have time and are so inclined,
> that would be great.  But if not, I'm not too worried.

Sounds reasonable to me, thanks.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=a9b973007c20 ***
